post.description: Generate a personalized podcast using user context from Pinecone.

get.description: Generate AI insights for a plant.

Create a new reminder for a plant.

get.description: Get paginated list of user's reminders.

post.description: Get personalized care advice for a plant.

Upload an image of a plant to receive AI-powered diagnosis including:
    - Plant species identification
    - Health condition assessment
    - Detailed diagnosis explanation
    - Actionable treatment plan

    The image should be clear, well-lit, and show the plant's current condition.
    Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP
    Maximum file size: 10MB
Upload a new photo for plant tracking.

get.description: Get all photos for a specific plant.
Get AI-generated progress insights from photo history.

post.description:
Send a message to the plant assistant and get a response.
Creates a new conversation if conversation_id is not provided.

get.description: Get all conversations for the current user.
Get messages for a specific conversation.

delete.description: Delete a conversation and all its messages.

get.description: Get a summary of user's stored context across all conversations.

delete.description: Delete all stored context for the current user.

post.description: Refresh user context by reprocessing recent conversations.
